feed.title: Terra Nova (National Park) - Weather - Environment Canada

entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Terra Nova (National Park)
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 4:14 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow or rain. Temperature rising to 6 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning this evening then changing to rain showers overnight. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 this evening then to 60 gusting to 80 after midnight. Temperature rising to 6 by morning. Wind chill minus 13 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind south 60 km/h gusting to 80 becoming southwest 40 gusting to 70 in the morning then diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 8.
entry.summary: Periods of rain. Amount 5 to 10 mm. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 except gusting to 70 along parts of the coast. Temperature steady near 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Rain or freezing rain. High zero.
entry.summary: Rain or freezing rain. High zero. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Snow or freezing rain. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4.
entry.summary: Freezing rain or rain. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Showers. Low plus 4.
entry.summary: Showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Showers. High 8.
entry.summary: Showers. High 8. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. Low plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Chance of showers. High plus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers. High plus 4. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Flurries. High minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NST Friday 13 January 2023
